turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hi alexa i wan to order pizza from the joint today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay sir what type of pizza were you thinking?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: well there are several people i need to feed so let's do an extra large pie for today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay they have two topping specialty pizza for sale

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay i will go ahead and do that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would say do mushroom and jalapeno

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay sounds good anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would like to switch out the regular cheese for vegan cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes i believe that can be done

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay good can you confirm my order for me please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes is it okay if your pizza arrives in 25 minutes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that is fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so it's an extra large pizza with mushrooms and jalapenos and vegan cheese

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that is correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay sir your order will arrive soon and the receipt will be sent as a text

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: to my phone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay thank you so much for helping

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem have a great day
